search.query: |makeresults | eval addon="data."| eval dataflow="" |eval datatag=`datatag`

|makeresults |eval usetstats="Yes" |eval notstats="No" |eval tstatstag=`tstatstag` |eval tstats_count=if(tstatstag=="Yes", "|tstats count where","") |eval tstats_nulls=if(tstatstag=="Yes", "|tstats fillnull_value=\"-\" count where","") |eval tstats_dc_name=if(tstatstag=="Yes", "|tstats dc(name) where","") |eval stats_dc_name=if(tstatstag=="No","|stats dc(name)","") |eval stats_count=if(tstatstag=="No", "|stats count ", "")
|eval tstats_dc_function=if(tstatstag=="Yes", "|tstats dc($datatag$resource.labels.function_name) as number where","") |eval stats_dc_function=if(tstatstag=="No","|stats dc($datatag$resource.labels.function_name) as number","")
|eval tstats_dc_type=if(tstatstag=="Yes", "|tstats dc($datatag$protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resourceAttributes.type) where","") |eval stats_dc_type=if(tstatstag=="No","|stats dc($datatag$protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resourceAttributes.type)","")
|eval tstats_by_methodname=if(tstatstag=="Yes", "by _time, $datatag$protoPayload.methodName span=$secs_for_bin$s","") |eval count_type=if(tstatstag!=" ","sum(count)","count")
|eval tstats_by_crud=if(tstatstag=="Yes","by $datatag$protoPayload.methodName, $datatag$resource.type, $datatag$timestamp, $datatag$protoPayload.authenticationInfo.principalEmail, $datatag$protoPayload.requestMetadata.callerIp, $datatag$protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.permission, $datatag$protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resourceAttributes.name, $datatag$protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resource","")

$tstats_nulls$ `gcp_assets_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:buckets:jsondata OR sourcetype=google:gcp:compute:instance) $stats_count$ by name, resource.parent |rex max_match=1 field=name "\S+\/projects\/(?<projectid>\S+)\/(zones|regions|global|topics|subscriptions|serviceAccounts)\/\S*" |rename resource.parent as parent |rex max_match=1 field=parent "\S*\/projects\/(?<id>\d*)" |stats count by projectid, id |search id>0 |table projectid, id
search projectid=$project_id_tok$

$tstats_dc_name$ `gcp_assets_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:buckets:jsondata OR sourcetype=google:gcp:compute:instance) $stats_dc_name$ by ancestors{}, asset_type | rename ancestors{} as ancestors
|search asset_type=*Disk ancestors=*$projectNumber$ | rename dc(name) as number
|search asset_type=*Instance ancestors=*$projectNumber$ | rename dc(name) as number
|search asset_type=*Bucket ancestors=*$projectNumber$ | rename dc(name) as number
$tstats_dc_function$ `gcp_index` sourcetype="google:gcp:pubsub:message" $datatag$logName="*cloud-functions" $datatag$resource.labels.project_id=$project_id_tok$ $stats_dc_function$
|search asset_type=*Network ancestors=*$projectNumber$ | rename dc(name) as number
|search asset_type=*Subnetwork ancestors=*$projectNumber$ | rename dc(name) as number
|search asset_type="k8s.io/Node" ancestors=*$projectNumber$ | rename dc(name) as number

$tstats_count$ `gcp_assets_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:buckets:jsondata) asset_type="k8s.io/Node" $stats_count$ by name, ancestors{} |rename ancestors{} as ancestors |search ancestors=*$projectNumber$ |eval ClusterName=replace(name,"(^\S+clusters\/\S+)\/k8s\S*","\1") | stats dc(ClusterName) | rename dc(ClusterName) as number

$tstats_count$ `gcp_index` sourcetype="google:gcp:pubsub:message" "data.logName"="projects/*/logs/cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity" data.protoPayload.methodName IN (*create*, *insert*) data.resource.labels.project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) AND data.resource.type IN($resource_type_tok$) $stats_count$

$tstats_count$ `gcp_index` sourcetype="google:gcp:pubsub:message" "data.logName"="projects/*/logs/cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity" data.protoPayload.methodName IN (*update*, *patch*) data.resource.labels.project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) AND data.resource.type IN($resource_type_tok$) $stats_count$

$tstats_count$ `gcp_index` sourcetype="google:gcp:pubsub:message" "data.logName"="projects/*/logs/cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity" data.protoPayload.methodName IN (*delete*) data.resource.labels.project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) AND data.resource.type IN($resource_type_tok$) $stats_count$
rename projectid as Project_ID

$tstats_dc_type$ `gcp_index` sourcetype=google:gcp:pubsub:message data.resource.labels.project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) $stats_dc_type$ by $datatag$resource.labels.project_id, $datatag$resource.type| rename $datatag$resource.type as resourceType|stats count by resourceType

$tstats_count$ `gcp_index` sourcetype="google:gcp:pubsub:message" "data.logName"="*/logs/cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity" $datatag$resource.labels.project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) $datatag$protoPayload.methodName IN ($create_del_tok$) AND $datatag$resource.type IN($resource_type_tok$) $tstats_by_methodname$ | timechart span=$secs_for_bin$s $count_type$ by $datatag$protoPayload.methodName

$tstats_nulls$ `gcp_index` sourcetype="google:gcp:pubsub:message" $datatag$logName="projects/*/logs/cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity" $datatag$resource.labels.project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) AND $datatag$resource.type IN($resource_type_tok$) ($datatag$protoPayload.methodName IN ("*create*", "*insert*") AND $datatag$protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.permission="*create*") $tstats_by_crud$ | eval name1='$datatag$protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resourceAttributes.name' | eval name2='$datatag$protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resource' | eval Name=if(name1="-", name2,name1) |search Name!="-" | rename $datatag$protoPayload.methodName as Method, $datatag$resource.type as "Resource Type", $datatag$protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.permission as Permission, $datatag$timestamp as Time, $datatag$protoPayload.authenticationInfo.principalEmail as User, $datatag$protoPayload.requestMetadata.callerIp as "Caller IP" | table Method, "Resource Type",Permission, Name, Time, User, "Caller IP"

$tstats_nulls$ `gcp_index` sourcetype="google:gcp:pubsub:message" $datatag$logName="projects/*/logs/cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity" $datatag$resource.labels.project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) AND $datatag$resource.type IN($resource_type_tok$) ($datatag$protoPayload.methodName IN ("*update*","*patch*","*insert*" ) AND $datatag$protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.permission IN ("*update*","*insert*")) $tstats_by_crud$ | eval name1='$datatag$protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resourceAttributes.name' | eval name2='$datatag$protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resource' | eval Name=if(name1="-", name2,name1) |search Name!="-" | rename $datatag$protoPayload.methodName as Method, $datatag$resource.type as "Resource Type", $datatag$protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.permission as Permission, $datatag$timestamp as Time, $datatag$protoPayload.authenticationInfo.principalEmail as User, $datatag$protoPayload.requestMetadata.callerIp as "Caller IP" | table Method, "Resource Type",Permission, Name, Time, User, "Caller IP"

$tstats_nulls$ `gcp_index` sourcetype="google:gcp:pubsub:message" $datatag$logName="projects/*/logs/cloudaudit.googleapis.com%2Factivity" $datatag$resource.labels.project_id IN ($project_id_tok$) AND $datatag$resource.type IN($resource_type_tok$) $datatag$protoPayload.methodName IN (*delete*) $tstats_by_crud$ | eval name1='$datatag$protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resourceAttributes.name' | eval name2='$datatag$protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.resource' | eval Name=if(name1="-", name2,name1) |search Name!="-" | rename $datatag$protoPayload.methodName as Method, $datatag$resource.type as "Resource Type", $datatag$protoPayload.authorizationInfo{}.permission as Permission, $datatag$timestamp as Time, $datatag$protoPayload.authenticationInfo.principalEmail as User, $datatag$protoPayload.requestMetadata.callerIp as "Caller IP" | table Method, "Resource Type",Permission, Name, Time, User, "Caller IP"
